item.title: How do i change starter look?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I was thinking of making my starter look so that your body and legs are invisible. (done that)
Then i made it so that you start with mime gloves and desert boots. (done that)
How do i change the following so that it looks like the macro look? (i dont macro i just want the look)

pHead=7; pTorso=25; pArms=29; pHands=35; pLegs=39; pFeet=44; pBeard=14;

By the way, this is going to be male character.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change starter look?
